name: AGAPE
description:
Have you ever wanted to befriend the world? Well, the obvious way to do it is to pay people to be your friend! It's that simple!

AGAPE is a game where you must complete jobs to earn money, which in turn you can spend on items that will cause more people to become your friend!

You could be a lawn mower, a fast food cook, or even a doctor, thanks to the connections you make as you gain friends.

This is a simple game made in a week for the 8 Bits To Infinity Easy Jam in April, 2020.
